display_long_description:
In this historical escape room, you will embark  yourself in an exciting adventure through time to recover the data of some of the most iconic characters in history: Leonardo da Vinci, Chanel & Marie Curie.

Your mission is to get into the lives of these geniuses and unlock the hidden data that has been carefully protected in different rooms. To achieve this, you must solve a series of riddles and puzzles each designed to represent the essence and contributions of these notable historical figures. 

The journey begins in Leonardo da Vinci's secret workshop, where you will encounter his sketches, inventions and masterpieces. To advance, you will have to solve different puzzles and tests to move on to the next rooms where you will find the other historical figures. Each time you solve a puzzle, you will unlock a crucial piece of information about the life and legacy of these historical geniuses and be able to move on to the next room.
